He pulls his long slender body out of a pool of lava which looks better

subroutines: M exall 24020 2~

description:
This golem seems to shift form between the elements.  Shifting from Fire
to ice and then to stone and mist.  It never stays in one form but is 
constantly shifting.  It's orb shaped eyes gleam with intelligence as
it scans the room looking for intruders.
24247.room_name: A large golem shifting between the elements stands in the center of the room.
24247.name: The elemental golem~
subroutines:
